title: "search your library for..." not implemented

comments.body:
This is due to a limitation of the current AI as it cannot handle the large number of choices resulting from a "search your library" effect.

**Labels:** -Type-Defect Type-Enhancement
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Ok. At least those like "search for a land" is not so complicated I think.
comments.author: [neoedmund](https://code.google.com/u/neoedmund/)

comments.body: Good point. We can probably implement searches that are limited to certain cards without affecting the AI.
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: This would also need some changes to the UI, as we have no way to choose cards from the library at the moment. Adding another icon below the graveyard/exile ones may be the easiest way.
